name: Intro to PitchPal
message: Welcome to the PitchPal demo! In this session, we’ll build an AI assistant that helps founders generate a full investor-ready pitch deck from just one idea. Let’s launch startups with AI.

name: Build PitchPal App
prompt: Create a React + TypeScript + Vite app for generating startup pitches from a user-provided idea. Include a text input for the startup idea, and output sections for product name, problem/solution, business model, and pitch summary. UI should be clean, centered, and visually dynamic. Store pitch in localStorage.

name: Add AI Pitch Generator Agent
prompt: Add a backend agent using AGNO that takes a startup idea and generates a pitch deck including: Product Name, Tagline, Problem, Solution, Business Model, and Go-To-Market strategy. Use Groq or GPT-4 and enable FileTools to optionally export to PDF.

name: UI Touch: Add Visual Pitch Cards
prompt: Render the AI-generated pitch as a set of colorful cards (e.g. Problem, Solution, Market, Revenue) with icons. Add download button to export the pitch.

name: Outro PitchPal
message: PitchPal is ready! With just one idea, you can now get a compelling pitch deck in minutes. The AI startup revolution has begun.
